item.title: JFL Life Sciences Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure

item.title: Mcleod Russel India Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure

item.title: Supreme Engineering Ltd Plunges to Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure

item.title: Bharti Airtel Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Sentiment
item.description: Bharti Airtel Ltd, a leading player in the Indian telecom sector, has witnessed a notable spike in put option trading ahead of the 24 February 2026 expiry, signalling increased bearish positioning and hedging activity among investors. Despite the stock’s underlying value hovering near ₹2,033, the surge in put contracts at the ₹2,000 strike price reflects growing caution in the market amid mixed technical signals and sector underperformance. Time: 28 minutes ago

item.title: Venus Remedies Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure

item.title: Tata Steel Ltd Sees Surge in Call Option Activity Amid Bullish Momentum

item.title: Shree Cement Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals
